O ne a tlolatlola ka maoto a magolo. “Mmutla!” o ne a bitsa. “A o na le dinaane?” “Dinaane?” go ne ga botsa Mmutla. “Ee, ke na le makgolo, dikete, nnyaa … dimilione tsa tsona.” “Mmutla, tsweetswee mphe dinaane dingwe gore ke kgone go itumedisa bana ba me.” “Hmmm…” ga bua Mmutla. “Ga ke na nako. Le gone … dinaane go le motshegare jaana? …Nnyaa!” Mme tloli, tloli, tloli a tswa a tsamaya. Moragonyana o ne a bona morubisi.  Fa a mo kopa dinaane o ne a tshikinya diphuka tsa gagwe ka go tenega. “E le …gore … o mang o ntsosang ke robetse? Ga ke na dinaane. Tsamaya o ye kwa go ntsu e kgolo ya ditlhapi. Ke ena yo tsogileng mo gare ga letsatsi. Mmotse.” Ke fa mosadi a tsamaela kwa ntlheng ya molomo wa Noka ya Tugela koo ntsu ya ditlhapi e neng e tsoma teng. Fa a mmona o ne a mmitsa ka leina la gagwe. Ntsu e kgolo ya ditlhapi e ne ya bua le ena ka mabetwaepelo. “Ko-ko-ko-ko!Ke goreng o ntshwenya fa ke tsoma?” “Ao, Ntsu ya Ditlhapi e e botlhale,” go ne ga bua mosadi, “Ke senkana le dinaane. A o a itse gore nka di bona kae?” “Ee,” ga bua Ntsu ya Ditlhapi, “Ke a itse gore o ka thusiwa ke bomang. Ya kwa matlapa a kopanang le lewatle. Ema teng mme o bitse kgarubane e kgolo.” Mosadi o ne a mo leboga mme a ya kwa tlasenyana ga lewatle. O biditse kgarubane e kgolo gabedi fela mme ke fa a tlhagelela mo metsing a a gasaganya. “O seke wa boifa,” ga bua Kgarubane. “Itshwarelele ka kgopana ya me. Ke tla go isa kwa bathong ba lewatle ba ba itseng dilo tsotlhe le dinaane tsotlhe.” Ba ne ba ya kwa tlase, tlase, tlase ga lewatle, go fitlha kwa botengteng, ka tlhamalalo go kgosi le mmakgosi ba lewatle. “Jaanong yo ke mang?” ga botsa kgosi. “Yo ke mosadi yo o tswang kwa mafatsheng a a omileng kwa godimo ga metsi a rona,” go ne ga sebaseba mmakgosi. “Ke eng se o se batlang, mosadi wa kwa mafatsheng a a omileng?” ga botsa mmakgosi. “Dinaane, Motlotlegi. A o na le tse nka di isang kwa go bagaetsho?” “Re na le tsona,” ga bua mmakgosi. “Fela a o na le sengwe se o ka ananyang dinaane tse ka sona?” “Le ka batla eng?” ga botsa mosadi. Kgosi le mmakgosi ba ne ba nyenya. “Re ka se kgone go tlhatlogela kwa mafatsheng a gago a a omileng. Re batla go bona gore go ntse jang. Re tlisetse sengwe go re bontsha gore go na le diphologolo le batho ba mofuta ofe.” “Ke tla dira jalo,” ga bua mosadi. Kgarubane e kgolo e ne ya mmusetsa kwa lefatsheng le legolo mme a leta fa mosadi a itlhaganela kwa gae go bolelela monna wa gagwe tsotlhe. “Ehe,” a bua a itumetse. “Ke na le ditsheto tse dintsi tsa diphologolo, tsa dinonyane le tsa batho. O ka nna wa di tsaya tsotlhe.” Ka bonako mosadi o ne a boela kwa lobopong a tshwere mokoa wa ditsheto. Kgarubane e ne ya kodumela gape mme ya mo isa le tsone kwa tlase, tlase, tlase. Fa kgosi le mmakgosi ba bona ditsheto, ba ne ba itumetse thata mme ba ne ba mo fa kgopana e ntle. “Re le neela mpho ya dinaane, wena le bagaeno. Nako nngwe le nngwe fa o batla naane, baya selo se mo tsebeng ya gago mme o reetse,” ba bua jalo. “Fela gakologelwa se,” kgosi e ne ya mo sebela mo tsebeng ya gagwe, “naane ya gago ya ntlha e simolotse ka loeto lwa gago la go tla kwano.” Fa kwa bofelong mosadi a boela kwa lobopong, monna wa gagwe, bana ba gagwe, le batho botlhe ba motse ba ne ba letile. Ba ne ba dirile molelo o mogolo thata o o neng o thanya le go thwanya mo lefifing. “Jaanong,” ba ne ba mmitsa, “re tlhabele naane. Re tseele naane!” Mosadi o ne a nyenya. O ne a tsholetsa kgopana mme a re, “Ee … Nal’ibali… Naane ke e. Ssshhh. Jaanong reetsang.” Mme ke ka moo naane ya ntlha e neng ya anegiwa ka teng. Morago mosadi o ne a baya kgopana mo tsebeng ya gagwe mme a anela dinaane tse dintsintsi. Mme fa e le gore e ke naane ya gagwe ya ntlha e o e utlwileng, gakologelwa, go na le tse dintsi, ntsi tse di latelang."

"Re itse se fa moithuti a kgona go : tlhalosa bokao jwa mefuta e mentsi ya ditlhangwa tse di kwadilweng , bonwang le tsa ponokutlo : bona tshedimosetso le dintlha moditlhangweng ; tlhalosa ntlhakemo ya mokwadi le / kgotsa moanelwa le go fa bosupi jo bo rileng jo bo tshegetsang go tswa mo ditlhangweng ; tlhalosa didiriswa tsa puo ya botshwantshi le e e tlhotlheletsang jaaka tshwantshiso , tshwantshanyo , sesupo le pharologanyo le ka mo di tlhotlheletsang bokao ka teng ; tlhalosa ditshwetso tsa mokwadi le go di bapisa le tsa gagwe ; ranola mefuta e e farologaneng yaditlhangwa tsa botshwantshi;neela le go tshegetsa tsibogo ya gagwe mo ditlhangweng . "
"Tlhatlhobotsweledi ke tsela ya tekanyetso e ditshwetso di ikaegileng ka go ithuta mo mefuteng e e farologaneng ya ditiro le ditiragalo tse di diragalang ka dinako tse di farologaneng ka nako ya go ithuta . "

"LENAANEFOKO akeronimi - lefoko le le agiwang ka go kapodisa ditlhaka / mafoko a ntlha a polelwana kgotsa leina ( sekao ; DIRT - Didiriswa tsa go Ithuta , go Ruta le Tshegetso ) . baakanya diphoso - go ntsha diphoso tsa mokwalo le matshwao a puiso a etswe tlhoko . baamogedi - bareetsi , babogedi , babuisi ba mefuta e e farologaneng ya tlhaeletsano ka kakaretso . baanelwa -batho ba mokwadi wa porosa a anelang ka ga bona , go tsenyeletsa le maina a bona boanedi - ditlhaloso le dikarologantsho tsa baanelwa boakaretsi - molawana o o reng thuto e fitlhelelwe ke barutwana botlhe ntle le go ba kgetholola ka ntlha ya bokoa bongwe jwa bona , e ka nna jwa dirwe tsa mmele kgotsa tlhaloganyo . bodiragatsi - go tsaya karolo mo motshamekong , sekao , terama . boiphediso -tiro e moithuti a batlang go e dira morago ga dithuto . ( Dithuto tse a di tlhophileng tsa motheo di lebane le tiro eo . ) boitlhamedi - mafoko a setheo kgotsa borutegi jo bo rileng ; e le mareo a a ka itsiweng ke ba setheo fela boitshimololedi - boikakanyetsi jwa moithuti ka nosi jo bo kgethegileng , a bo ithaetse go tlhagisa kitso ya gagwe . bolau- selo se se kotsi / se se ka senyang tse di siameng dikaelo tsa serala - mafoko a a mo masakaneng a a kwadilweng ka ditlhaka tse di sekameng tse di supang se modiragatsi a se buiwang le se a tla se dirang dikarolo tsa polelo - dikarolwana tse di bopang polelo jk , lediri , sedirwa , letiro , dipolelwana jj . dipuisano - ditherisano tse go ikaeletsweng gore go dumalanwe ka mogopolo pele go tsewa tshwetso kgotsa go dirwa sengwe dingangisano - dikganetsano tse mo go tsona go nang le matlhakore a le mabedi ba bangwe ba dumelana le ntlha ba bangwe ba e ganetsa diponagalo - dilo dingwe tse di itlhophileng tse di tlhaolang se sengwe go se sengwe jaaka poko e farologana le padi . "

"PUO , SETAELE LE GO TSEREGANYA ( MADUO 15 ) -Kelotlhoko ya kamego ya puo . -Puo le matshwaopuiso di dirisitswe ka tolamo . -O dirisa puo e e maleba thata ya botshwantshi . -Tlhopho ya mafoko e matsetseleko e bile e a kgwedisa. -Setaele , segalo le rejisetara di maleba thata le setlhogo . -Totatota ga go diphoso dipe ka ntlha ya go runwa le go siamisiwa . -Kelotlhoko ya kamego ya puo -Puo le matshwaopuiso di siame ; o kgona go dirisa puo ya botshwantshi . -Tlhopho ya mafoko e boitlhamedi e bile e a farologanngwa . -Setaele , segalo le rejisetara di maleba le setlhogo . -Tota ga go diphoso dipe ka ntlha ya go runwa le go siamisiwa . -Kelotlhoko ya kamego ya puo e a bonala . -Puo le matshwaopuiso go le gantsi di nepagetse . -Tlhopho ya mafoko e siametse temana . -Setaele , segalo le rejisetara di siametse setlhogo . -Go le gantsi ga go na diphoso ka ntlha ya go runwa le go siamisiwa . -Kelotlhoko ya kamego ya puo e tennyana -Puo e botlhofo , matshwaopuiso a lekanetse . -Tlhopho ya mafoko e lekane . -Setaele , segalo le rejisetara di tsamaelana le ditlhokego tsa setlhogo . -Go sa ntse go na le diphoso tse di mmalwa le fa go runnwe e bile go siamisitswe . -Kelotlhoko ya kamego ya puo e nnye . -Puo e magareng , matshwaopuiso gantsi ga a dirisiwa ka nepo . -Tlhopho ya mafoko e e sa reng sepe . -Setaele , segalo , le rejisetara ga di golagane . -Go na le diphoso di le mmalwa le fa go runnwe e bile go siamisitswe . -Puo le matshwaopuiso di bokoa . -Tlhopho ya mafoko e a tlhaela . -Setaele , segalo le rejisetara ga di maleba . -Go phephetha diphoso le fa go runnwe e bile go siamisitswe . -Puo le matshwaopuiso di bokoa thata . -Tlhopho ya mafoko ga e maleba . -Setaele , segalo le rejisetara di fosagetse gotlhelele . -Go phephetha diphoso le ketsaetsego le fa go runnwe e bile go siamisitswe . "

"PUO , SETAELE LE BOSUPI JWA PALO ( MADUO 7 ) -Thutapuo ya mo setlhangweng e nepagetse e bile e agegile ka bontle jo bo gaisang . -Tlotlofoko e e humileng e le maleba mo maitlhomong , baamogeding le mo bokaong . -Setaele , segalo le tirisopuo di maleba go gaisa . -Setlhangwa se lebega se se na diphoso morago ga go buisiwa gape le go tlhotlhwa diphoso . -Boleele bo nepagetse . -Setlhangwa se agilwe bontle se nepagetse . -Tlotlofoko e e maleba tota mo maitlhomong , baamogeding le mo bokaong . -Setaele , segalo le tirisopuo di maleba fa go lebeletswe ditlhokego tsa tiro . -Setlhangwa ka kakaretso ga se na diphoso morago ga go buisiwa gape le go tlhotlhwa diphoso . -Boleele bo nepagetse . -Setlhangwa se agilwe sentle , se buisega bonolo . -Tlotlofoko e e maleba mo maitlhomong , baamogeding le mo bokaong . -Setaele , segalo le tirisopuo go le gantsi di maleba . -Setlhangwa go le gantsi ga se na diphoso morago ga go buisiwa gape le go tlhotlhwa diphoso . -Boleele bo nepagetse . -Setlhangwa se agilwe ka go itumedisa . -Diphoso tse di leng gone ga di kgoreletse kelelo ya dikakanyo . -Tlotlofoko ka tekano mo maitlhomong , baamogeding le mo bokaong . -Setaele , segalo le tirisopuo di siame , di maleba . -Setlhangwa se sa ntse se na le diphoso morago ga go buisiwa gape le go tlhotlhwa diphoso . -Boleele jo bo batlileng go nepagala. -Setlhangwa se agilwe ka ditlhokego fela tse di tlhokegang . -Diphoso di mmalwa . -Tlotlofoko e a tlhaela e bile ga e maleba mo maitlhomong , baamogeding le mo bokaong . -Tlhaelo ya setaele , segalo le tirisopuo fale le fale . -Setlhangwa se na le diphoso tse di mmalwa morago ga go buisiwa gape le go tlhotlhwa diphoso . -Boleele jo bo feteletseng kgotsa jo bokhutshwane . -Setlhangwa se agilwe bokoa e bile se thata go se tlhaloganya . -Tlotlofoko e tlhokwa go boeletswa , mme ga e maleba mo maitlhomong , baamogeding le mo bokaong . -Setlhangwa se na le diphoso tse di thibang letsatsi , le mororo se buisitswe gape le go tlhotlhwa diphoso . -Boleele jo bo feteletseng kgotsa jo bokhutshwane thata . -Setlhangwa se agilwe bokoa e bile go thata go se tlhaloganya . -Tlotlofoko e tlhoka go boeletswa ka tsenelelo , mme ga e maleba mo maitlhomong , baamogeding . -Setlhangwa se diphoso gotlhe tse di thibang letsatsi , e bile go tlhakatlhakane gotlhe . -Boleele jo bo feteletseng kgotsa jo bokhutshwane thatathata . "

"Kwa bofelong ba Kereiti ya 11 moithuti yo o Kwa bofelong ba Kereiti ya 12 moithuti yo o fitlheletseng dithuto ka tekano a ka : fitlheletseng dithuto ka tekano a ka : bua le go tlhagisa ditlhangwa ka thotloetso fela ¦ bua le go tlhagisa ditlhangwa ka nyalelano le go se na nyalelano le tomagano ya dikakanyo ka tomagano ya dikakanyo ka tlhotlheletso e e rileng ; metlha ; bontsha ka tekano maitemogelo le bontsha ka tekano maitemogelo le tiriso ya puo ka tirisopuo ka tshisimogo le tlotlo ; nna tsebentlha tshisimogo le tlotlo ; nna tsebentlha ka tekano go ka tekano go lemoga le go tlhatlhoba fela a nna lemoga le go ranola fela a nna le bothata go le bothata ba go sekaseka le go tlhatlhoba sekaseka le go tlhatlhoba tshedimosetso ; dirisa puo tshedimosetso ; dirisa puo ka thelelo e e ka thelelo e e lekaneng mo maemong a a lekaneng mo maemong a tlhaeletsano fela ka tlwaelegileng a tlhaeletsano . dinako dingwe a tlhaela go tlhagisa maikutlo . ranola ditlhangwa ka tekano fa a buisa le go ¦ ranola ditlhangwa ka tekano fa a buisa le go lebelela fela a itemogela bothata le fa a bona lebelela fela a itemogela bothata fa a sekaseka , thuso fa a sekaseka le go tlhatlhoba tlhatlhoba le go tlhalosa tshedimosetso ; bontsha tshedimosetso ; bontsha go tlhaloganya go go tlhaloganya go go lekaneng le go fa dikakanyo lekaneng le go fa dikakanyo tsa gagwe a ba a di tsa gagwe a bo a di tshegetsa ; buisetsa kwa tshegetsa ka dinako dingwe ; buisetsa kwa godimo ka thelelo e e lekaneng le ka maikutlo ; godimo ka thelelo le maikutlo a a lekaneng ; bontsha tshisimogo e e lekaneng mo bontsha tshisimogo e e lekaneng mo dikakanyong tsa ba bangwe le mo go tsa setso dikakanyong tsa ba bangwe tsa le tsa setso tse di tse di farologaneng . farologaneng . nna le kelotlhoko e e lekaneng go boitlhamedi , ¦ nna le kelotlhoko e e lekaneng go boitlhamedi , nyalelano le tomagano ya dikakanyo le nepo fa nyalelano le tomagano ya dikakanyo le nepo fa a kwala / tlhagisa ; kwala le go tlhagisa ka tekano a kwala / tlhagisa ; kwala le go tlhagisa ka tekano go ya ka baamogedi , maitlhomo , bokao le go ya ka baamogedi , maitlhomo , bokao le dikagego tse di farologaneng ; aga dikakanyo le dikagego tse di farologaneng ; aga dikakanyo le dintlha tsa tshegetso ka diteng tse di nang le dintlha tsa tshegetso ka tse di nang le boitlhamedi le tsepamo di le dinnye mme a boitlhamedi le tsepamo di le dinnye mme a tlhoka go thusiwa ka dinako tsotlhe ; bontsha tlhoka thuso ; bontsha ka tekano bosupi jwa gore bosupi jo bo lekaneng jwa setaele sa gagwe ; o dirisitse setaele sa gagwe ; boeletsa le go boeletsa le go tlhotlha diphoso a ntse a tlhoka tlhotlha diphoso a ntse a tlhoka thuso ya thuso ya mongwe go netefatsa tokafalo e e mongwe go netefatsa tokafalo e e siameng . siameng . nna tsebentlha tshedimosetso fela a itemogela bothata fa a go go lekaneng go lemoga , le go ranola sekaseka , ranola le go tlhalosa ditlhangwa ; dirisa tshedimosetso fela a itemogela mathata fa a puo ka thelelo e e lekaneng mo maemong a a sekaseka le go tlhalosa ditlhangwa ; bontsha go tlhaloganya ka dingwe ka boene ; bontsha go tlhaloganya ka tekano fela a okaoka fa a dikakanyo tsa gagwe tekano fela a okaoka fa a fa dikakanyo tsa le go di tshegetsa ; buisetsa kwa godimo ka gagwe le go di tshegetsa ; buisetsa kwa godimo thelelo e e lekaneng ; bontsha tshisimogo e e ka thelelo e e lekaneng ; bontsha tshisimogo e e lekaneng mo dikakanyong le mo dintlheng tsa lekaneng mo dikakanyong le mo dintlheng tsa setso tse di farologaneng . setso tse di farologaneng . kwala le go tlhagisa ka tekano fela ditlhangwa ¦ kwala le go tlhagisa ka tekano fela ditlhangwa di bontsha tlhaelo ya nyalelano le tomagano ya di bontsha tlhaelo ya nyalelano le tomagano ya dikakanyo le nepagalo ka dinako dingwe ; dikakanyo le nepagalo ka dinako dingwe ; kwala / tlhagisa go ya ka baamogedi , maitlhomo , kwala / tlhagisa go ya ka baamogedi , maitlhomo , maemo le dikagego tse di farologaneng ka thuso maemo le dikagego tse di farologaneng ka thuso ya mongwe , ka tekano ; rulaganya dikakanyo ka ya mongwe , ka tekano ; rulaganya dikakanyo ka tlhomamo le ka tekano ; boeletsa le go baakanya tlhomamo le ka tekano ; boeletsa le go baakanya diphoso mo dikwalong fela a tlhoka thuso ka diphoso mo dikwalong fela a tlhoka thuso ka dinako tsotlhe go tila diphoso tse di ka senyang dinako dingwe go tila diphoso tse di senyang bokao . bokao ka dinako dingwe . "KGAOLO 8: DIKGOTLATSHEKELO LE TSAMAISO YA BOSIAMISI"
"ditsamaiso tsa tsona, le go tlhabolola molao wa selegae, go etswe tlhoko dikgatlhegelo tsa"
"174."
"boatlhodi. Motho mongwe le mongwe yo a tla kgethelwang mo Kgotlatshekelong"
-5
"Molaotheo fa go nale phatlhatiro mo go ngwe le ngwe ya dikantoro tseo, kgotsa"
"go tlhopha baatlhodi ba nama-o-satshwere go dikgotlatshekelo tse dingwe morago"
"[ Tema (b) e emetswe k. 16(a) ya Molaotheo Tlhabololo wa Borataro wa Molao ya 2001.]"
"boadfokata go emela borutegi joo ka kakaretso, e bile ba tlhophilwe ke"
"tlhophilweng ke Khansele ka tshegetso ya bonnye diboutu tsa diporofense di"
"Khomišene ya Tirelo ya Bosiamisi e ka gakolola puso ya bosetšhaba ka morero"
"k. 16(c) ya Molaotheo Tlhabololo wa Borataro wa Molao wa 2001.]"
"Bothati ba Botšhotšhisi"
"Palamente."
"Bothati ba botšhotšhisi bo na le maatla a go tlhatlhela molato wa tshenyo,"
"Mokaedi wa Bosetšhaba wa Botšhotšhisi –"
"boatlhodi; le"
-3
"Mosireletsi wa Setšhaba ga a tshwanela go batlisisa ditshwetso tsa kgotlatshekelo."
"akaretswa matla–"
"(a) a go batlisisa le go dira pegelo mametlelelo ya ditshwanelo tsa botho;"
"tlhokomelo ya boitekanelo, dijo, metsi, tshireletsego ya loago, thuto le tikologo."
"[K. 184 e tlhabolotswe ke k. 4 ya Molao 65 wa 1998.]"
-3

"(a) go nna le baemedi ka kakaretso ba ditlhopha tsotlhe tsa setso, bodumedi le"
"Khomišene ya Tekatekano ya Bong"
-3
"Khomišene ya Tekatekano ya Bong e na le maatla, jaaka go theilwe ka molao"
"merero e e amang tekatekano ya bong."
"tsamaelana le laola ya molao nngwe le nngwe, Moruni Kakaretso a ka runa le go"
"di tshwanetse go diriwa phatlalatsa."
"ntšhwafadiweng, ya gare ga dingwaga di le tlhano go ya go di le lesome."
"Khomišene ya Ditlhopho e na le dithata le ditiro tsa tlaleletso tse di tlhalositsweng"
"Dikaelo-Kakaretso"
"Tlhokego ya go tlhama khomišene go tsamaelana le kgaolo ê, go bontsha ka"
"Moruni-Kakaretso o tshwanetse go nna mosadi kgotsa monna yo e leng moagi"
"Moporesidente, ka tshitsinyo ya Kokoano Bosetšhaba, o tshwanetse go thapa"
"Ntlokokoano Bosetšhaba e tshwanetse go tshitsinya maina a batho –"
"ditokololo tsa makoko otlhe a emetsweng mo Ntlokokoano;"
"Kamego ya baagi mo tsamaisong ya ditshitsinyo e ka rulaganwa go ya ka"
-1
"Moporesidente –"
"(a) a ka kgaola motho mo tirong nako nngwe le nngwe morago ga tshimologo ya"
"(b) a ka ntsha motho mo tirong fa Ntlokokoano e dirile tshwetso ya gore motho"
"yoo a ntshiwe mo tirong."
-2
"(g) Tsamaiso e tshwanetse go dirilwa mo pontsheng ka go abela setšhaba"
"(h) Go tshwanetse go netefatsa taolo ya tsamaiso ya bokgoni, le tlwaelo ya"
"KGAOLO 10: TSAMAISO YA PUSO"
"laolang tsamaiso ya puso."
"Khomišene ya Bodiredipuso"
"196 ."
"Go na le Khomišene ya Bodiredipuso e le nosi mo Rephaboliking."
"Ditheo tse dingwe tsa puso, ka tiriso ya molao le dikgato tse dingwe, di tshwanetse"
"tshwetso ngwe le ngwe, taelo le kgakolo, le go tlamela ka tshekatsheko"
"(6) Khomišene e tshwanetse go dira pegelo bonnye, gangwe ka ngwaga go ya ka karolo"
"go –"
"(ii) go amogelwa ke Ntlokokoano ka tshwetso e e dirilweng ka bontsi jwa"
"Bakomišenara ba ba tlhalositweng mo karolotlaleletso 7(b) ba ka diragatsa dithata"

"08Baopedi ba le mmalwa mono Afrika Borwa ba tlhagisitse matshwenyego mabapi le go sa rebolelwe matlole a namolo go latela leroborobo leno. Unemployment Insurance Fund ya re baopedi ba feta dikete tse pedi ba amogetse matlole a namolo go tswa go lefapha la Botaki le setso morago ga gore ditiragatso tsa bona di phimolwe go latela dintlha kaelo tsa go thibela go anama ga coronavirus mo nageng.Bana ba le dimillione kwa Amerika ba boleletswe gore ba ka se boele dikolong ngwaga ono otlhe, e le fa leroborobo la coronavirus le tsweletse go etegela."
"12Tona ya lefapha la boitekanelo Zweli Mkhize a re lefapha la gagwe le tlile go batlisisa dipego tsa gore diSanitizer dingwe tse di rekisediwang baagi, di ka tswa di sa atlenegisiwa, e leng sengwe se se ka nnang kotsi mo boitekanelong le pabalesego ya baagi.Seteishene sa mapodisi sa Mmabatho se tswaletswe morago ga gore go fitlhelwe fa yo mongwe wa badiri a tshwaeditswe ke coronavirus."
"Dikgang20...Palamente e tlile go dirisa nako e ntsi go sekaseka tekanyetsokabo ya tlaleletso ya monongwaga beke eno...Eskom e tla tswelelapele ka legato la bo2 la kgaogo ya tlamelo ya motlakase go tloga ka ura ya bo9 mo mosong..."
"Dikgang19...Setlamo sa Eskom sa re ga go sepe seo e ka se tlaleletsang ka ga magatwe le go se tshepagale kgatlhanong le mokhuduthamaga mogolo wa sone Jan Oberholzer...Diteishene tse dingwe gape di le 2 tsa mapodisi kwa Free State sa Hertzogville le Bayswater kwa Bloemfontein, di tswetswe nakwana morago ga go tshwaediwa ga mapodisi a le 2 ke coronavirus..."
"Madume, re mmogo gape Mojalefa Mathibela go fitlha ka tsa ura ya borobongwe.Dikgang18...Tonakgolo ya KwaZuluNatal Sihle Zikalala a re porofense ya gaabo e na le batho ba le 873 ba ba tshwaeditsweng ke COVID 19 kwa dikolong...Baitseanape ba merero ya dipolotiki ba re puo ya sigong jono ya mopresidente Cyril Ramaphosa, e tlile go tsepamisa mogolo go sechaba gore se tseye COVID19 tsia..."
"Dikgang16...Lekoko la Economic Freedom Fighters mono North West le ikuela go barutwana, mekgatlho ya barutabana le batsadi go ngala dikolo...Bangwe ba bakgweetsi ba ditraka ba re ba itumeletse gore kgoro ya molelwane wa Beitbridge kwa Limpopo e phepafaditswe ka dibolaya ditwatsi morago ga go tshwaediwa ga badiri ba le 2 ke Coronavirus..."
"Dikgang14...Lefapha la thuto e kgolwane le ikuela go baithuti ba ba santseng ba solofetswe go boela kwa ditheong tsa thuto e kgolwane, go netefatsa fa ba nna kwa magaeng ka maitlhomo a go fokotsa go anama ga coronavirus...Media Monitoring Africa ya re COVID19 e ama thata madirelo a bobegadikgang mo nageng. Mokgatlho wa re bobegadikgang jo bo ikaegileng ka dipapatso bo tlile go amega go gaisa..."
"Dikgang16...Lefapha la bosechaba la matlotlo la re dithulaganyo di tsweletse tsa go tlhama Banka ya Puso...Helen Suzman Foundation e batla gore tona ya mapodisi Bheki Cele le komiti ya palamente e malebana le mapodisi, go emisa thulaganyo ya go thapiwa ga mookamedi yo montshwa wa bokaedi jo bo ikemetseng ba dingongorego kgatlhanonmg le mapodisi IPID, go santse go letetswe katlholo e saletseng morago ya kgotlatshekelo ya boikuelo..."
"13Komishine e batlisisang dipego tsa tlhotlheletso ya ditshweetso mo mafapheng a puso e utlwile ka moo mokhuduthamaga mogolo wa pele wa Prasa Lucky Montana a fitlheletseng ka gona dikago di le mmalwa ka thuso ya ditlamo tse di nang le kgolagano le borrakontraka ba setlamo seno se se laolwang ke puso...Mapodisi kwa cape Town ba re ba botsolotsa batho ba le mmalwa go latela polao ya moeteledipele wa baagi kwa Mfuleni le morwadie wa dingwaga tse thataro."
"11Tona ya lefapha la boitekanelo Zweli Mkhize a re leroborobo la coronavirus le solofetswe go padimola naga go fitlha mo bokhutlong ba ngwaga o tlang.South African National Taxi Council SANTACO e totobaditse gore beng ba ditaxi ba tlile go tswelela go pega palo e nepagetseng ebile e tlwaelegile ya bapagami go fitlha Tona ya dipalangwa Fikile Mbalula a rarabolola dingongorego tsa bona mabapi le dintlhakaelo tsa go laolwa ga metsamao ya batho le go sekegiwa ga ditirelo dingwe mo nageng."
"07DIKGANG Tona ya matlotlo Tito Mboweni a re Afrika Borwa o lebanwe ke kgweetlho e e kgolo ya sekoloto,ntle fela le fa ditshenyegelo di ka fokodiwa.Maloko a komiti ya ditlhaeletsano kwa palamenteng a kaile fa a ema kgatlhanong le tsitsinyo ya go fokodiwa ga badiri mo SABC."
"21 Dikgang Tsala ya DMk tema e felela fa, a ebe boroko  Kgotlatshekelo kgolo ya South Gauteng e dumetse go reetsa morero o o magareng ga Airlink le bagakolodi ba thuso ya kgwebo ba SAA ka laboraro.Sebueledi sa tona ya dipalangwa Fikile Mbalula o ganedise dipego tsa gore tona o ne a tshwanela ke go tshabisiwa mo bakgweetsing ba ditaxi ba ba neng ba shakgetse kwa bogare ba toropo ya Pretoria go sale gale gompieno."
"21DIKGANG Dinaga di le nne tsa European Union le setlamo se segolo sa kalafi sa AstraZeneca ba saenile tumallano e ba solofelang e tla lebisa kwa go tlameleng baagi ba kwa Europe ka meento e le dimilione di le kgolo a mane.Go tshwerwe mmelaelwa ka ntlha ya go golaganngwa le polao ya mosadi yo setopo sa gagwe se fitlhetsweng kwa sekgweng kwa Dobsonville, Soweto maabane.Motho re e konosetsa fa ke lebogile jaka gale ka tshegetso le theetso le kamoso, go fitlha re kopana gape nako e e tlang ae nne boroko"
"18DIKGANG Kgotla ya tsweletso ya molaotheo mo Afrika Borwa CASAC ya re mokgwa o le nosi fela wa gore palamente e siamise molaotlhomo wa tshireletso ya tshedimosetso ya puso ke gore e o simolole seshwa.Motlatsa mopresidente David Mabuza a re botsamaise ba Eskom bo netefaleditse puso gore gago tle go nna le kgaogo ya tlamelo ya motlakase mo setlheng seno sa mariga."
"08DIKGANG United Nations Population Fund e tsibositse gore mo sebakeng sa dikgwedi dingwe le dingwe di le thataro tsa go laolwa ga metsamao le go emisiwa ga ditirelo dingwe ka ntlha ya go leka go thibela go anama ga coronavirus, go ka itemogela go ima go go sa rulaganngwang ga basadi ba ka nna dimilione di le supa.Setheo se se lekanyetsang seemo sa ikonomi sa dinaga Fitch se solofetse fa ikonomi ya naga e tlile go wela tlase ka diphesente di le 5.5 monongwaga."

"Ba re, bojalwa bo ne bo tsewa e le selo sa go intsha lenyora, selo sa maitiso le go itlosa bodutu."
"Ba re ke tshwanelo gore ba tsenye letsogo mo ditlhabololong ka gore fa dikago tse ditona jaaka mmadikole di le mo motsing banni ba solofela go le gontsi mo bodireding le mo go bone baithuti tota."
"Bareki le bone ba ne ba sa tlhole ba mo kgatlhegela."
"Ba re matsapa ke gore fa go fudusiwa barutabana bangwe koo, go tsaya lebaka gore diphatlha tsa bone di kabiwe."
"Ba re nonyane, setotojane, tsiakgope, khukhwane le seboko, di dira mamere mo masimong a bone."
"Ba rotloeditse banana ba bangwe go sa kgobiwe marapo ke mela e meleele ka letsatsi la ditlhopho gonne ba tla a bo ba ya go itlhophela moemedi yo o tla tsisang diphetogo gammogo le go araba matshwenyego a bone a akaretsa a thuto le letlhoko la mebereko."
"Barui ba supile gape fa matlhabelo a lefatshe leno a sa bereke sentle ka ntlha ya boitseme jwa bodiredi le go kobiwa ga bodiredi nako le nako."
"Barwaake ba le babedi le bone ga ba ise ba nyale."
"Ba sepodise ba bolela gore, leruo le le bakang dikotsi tsa tsela tse, di a ba sokodisa, bogolo jang leruo le le senang matshwao le ditshipi tsa beng."
"Ba sepodise ba dirisanya le ba itshireletso go lwantsha borukutlhi jo bo golelang pele."
"Basiamang a re o itumeletse ka fa batshameki ba gagwe ba dirileng sentle ka teng."
"Ba simolola go lema ba lemela go ja le go jesa loruo."
"Batho ba kopiwa gore ba se ka ba gasagasa matlakala ka, jaaka re itse, a ka felela a jewa ke loruo lo lo mo motseng, mme go se ke go siame."
"Batho ba mogare o sa itshuping mo go bone, ba bidiwa batshudi ba one."
"Batho, bogolo jang barui, ba huhula megopolo ba ipotsa gore fa go ka tswelela go ntse jaana, go ya go felela kae."
"Ba tle Batswana go tla go utlwa gore ba ka thusiwa jang go inamola lehuma."
"Ba tlhalositse gore ntswa ba ise ba nne le ditsompelo tse di lekaneng tsa go tsamaisa kgwebo, ba tsweletse ka go itemogela kgolo ka jaana ba bolela fa ditlhopha ka go farologana di tsweletse ka go ba rotloetsa."

"Ga twe batho ba lwala malwetse a mantsi a tota re ka a hemang."
"Ga twe ene o ne a kgothatsa batho go bua diteme tsa bone gongwe le gongwe fa ba leng teng."
"Ga twe e rile Rre Batlhophi a bua ka maikaelelo a metshameko e, a re, ke go ntsha bana mo mekgwatlheng."
"Ga twe fa bo sale bonnye bo bontle thata ka bo bo tala; botala bo bo jesang leitlho monate."
"Ga twe go dira jalo e kete motho ga a tsholega."
"Ga twe jaaka gale, batho ba tlhomagana, ba dikologa kesi go bona se se mo teng."
"Ga twe ka dikotla le mahura a tsone, le ka fa di agang mmele ka teng, dithotse di tshwana fela le dinawa le letlhodi."
"“Ga twe ke godile ke le setoutu."
"Ga twe koo, e ne ya na ka kgwedi ya Tlhakole."
"Ga twe mopalamente o ne a aba ditlhare tsa meriti."
"Ga twe motho mongwe a tswa a ya go bapala maungo a naga."
"Ga twe o ne a re, basadi ka bontsi ke ditlhogo tsa malwapa, e bile ba dira ditiro tse dintsi thata go gaisa banna."
"Ga twe setshaba se tswe Women Collective tema."
"Go a bo go twe, a dire ka pela; a dire ka bofefo, ka bonako, a itlhaganele."
"Go araba dipotso tse, a re tseye sekai re re, Mheti ke morui wa kgomo tse dintsi."
"Go a supagala fa Mme Kgarametso, 40, a tsenye mo kgwebong ka lorato."
"Go beolwa gone ga twe ke go ntsha sefifi kgotsa bomadimabe ka loso ke selo se se maswe."
"Go boeng kwa Israel ka feta ka ruta mo sekoleng sa temothuo Botswana Agricultural College (BAC) dingwaga tse tlhano."
"Go boifa botlhoko jwa loaro le lobaka lwa go fola ga loaro, ke mangwe a mabaka a go sa itshupeng ga borre."
"Go bolelwa gore e ne e le motho yo o tletseng lorato le metlae e mentsi."
"Go boletswe fa ene le Rre Pilane ba ne ba thusa thata mo go agiweng ga kereke ya Leologa/Shepherd Memorial Church."
"Go bona ka fa a neng a dira sentle ka teng, ga twe batho ba mo rata mme ba simolola go kopa gore a ba thuse."
"Go bonala batho koo ba ntse ba eleditse go bona e re nako nngwe ba bo ba bala Baebela ka teme ya bone."
"Go bonala fa sekole se, se ka bo se sale se agilwe mme se diilwe ke gone gore, ga go na madi."
"Go buile jalo mookamedi wa kereke ya Eloyi Christian Church, Bishop Sekai Jakoba mo potsolotsong le BOPA morago ga gore kereke ya gagwe e abele kokelo ya Palapye dikobo di le masome a borobabobedi le bone le melora ka Matlhatso."
"Go buisana le mosadimogolo yo wa molekane wa ga Diyoka ya nna bothata go fitlhela go tla masogwana a mabedi."
"Go buiwa ka diteme tsa batho bantsho jaaka sezulu, sexhosa, le tse dingwe, di ne tsa emisiwa go rutiwa, selo se seneng sa kgobera maikutlo a baithuti."
"Godimo ga dithuto tse a tlaa bong a di fentse, ngwana o ne a tshwanetse go nna gape le Sekgoa."
"Godimo ga moo, ga twe dithotse tsa lephutshe di thusa go tlhatswa madi, go nonotsha masole a mmele, go thusa matlho go bona sentle, le go tlhatswa letlalo, bogolo jang la bana."
"Go dira jalo go tlaa re timetsa, re tseye gore, tsotlhe ka mananeo a, ke tsela tshweu ntswa go sa nna jalo."
"Go gatelelwa gore re je dijo ka go di tlhaola, le go di lekanyetsa, e seng go ja fela ka gore ke dijo di tshwanetse go jewa, kana go jela fela go laolwa ke mpa."
"Go ka nna gore, motho a bo a sa rulaganya gore, tiro e tlaa simololwa jang, kana fa kae, e tswelele jang, e bo e wele jang."
"Go kgaoga pelo go tlaa bo go raya gore Mhudi o ne a tshoga thata."
"Go kwala sentle, Naledi e ka bo e ne ya re, ‘Tumelo le fa e ka tswa e le efe…."
"Go lebega fa ene a ne a leka fela kwa ntle ga puso mme a kgona."
"Go lebega fa lenaneo la go rudisa itsholelo, le ka Sekgoa ba reng ke Economic Stimulus Programme, le setse le na le motlhala."
"Go lebega fa motse o, o ntse o se na diofisi tsa kgotla mme jaanong, selelo se, se tlaa fela."
"Go lebega go sa nna jalo."
"Go le gangwefela fela ke gone le neng la kwalwa sentle e le “A re”, e seng, “Are”."
"Go leka go o kgotletsa, re utlwa fa gangwe le gape go dirwa meletlo, go tshwarwa dithuto puisanyo, tse mo go tsone go abelanwang megopolo ya go tlhabolola temo thuo."
"Go leka go rurifatsa kgotsa go ganetsa se Tlale a se buileng, megala ya ga mmaagwe morwae e ne e seo mo phefong."
"“Go lemosega fa rre yo a ne a akanya gore mosadi o sule mme a inaya naga le go ikaletsa ka kgole go bapa le seporo sa terena."
"Go makgetho a le mantsi bobegadikgang bo romela dipotso kwa maphateng a puso e le dikgang tse di tlhokang seabe sa one, mme bagolwane ba itiri moruti o tsididi ka go tsibogela dikarabo tseo."
"Gompieno, Mmualebe ga a na ape a mantsi fa e se go botsa fela gore, fa bangwe ba itse, ba thuse."
"Gompieno potso ke yone eo, gore, a ’dula’’ke Setswana kgotsa nnyaa?"
"Gompieno yoo tlhokang thuso yame go dupa le go sika metsi a ntseye abo a mpusetse mo lwapeng."
"Go na le mabaka a le mmalwa a mo go one bogodu jwa leruo boneng jwa lwantshiwa ka tiriso ya ditlhobolo."
"Go nale sengwe se se ntshwenyang ka lekalana la CEDA."
"Gone fa, bangwe ba ka botsa gore, o di gile a di tlatsa kgama a re di tlaa rwalwa ke mang?"
"Gone fa, ke gone Motswana a re, dilo makwati di kwatobololwa mo go ba bangwe."
"Go ne ga tla nako ya gore banyalani ba fiwe sebaka sa go bolelela morafe ka fa ba kopaneng ka teng."
"Go ne go bonala gore ke dikhwaere di ntse di batlana ka matlho a mahibidu, bogolo jang ka go ne go utlwala gore Kgalapitse e ne e kopile Mawelana go thulana le yone mo kgaisanyong ya malatsi a keresemose, le ngwaga o mosha, monongwaga."
"Go ne go le gontle go bona Batswana ba ipela ka dingwao tsa bone, ba di bua, ba di boka, ba di opela go ipelela dingwaga tse di masome matlhano lefatshe leno le ipusa."
"Go ne gosa tsene mongwe le mongwe."
"Go ne go se bonolo go atisa leruo kwa motsaneng oo."
"Go ne go setse go le ditshokologo, letsatsi le sa lele le tserema."
"Gone kwa modirong o, go ne ga nna le khupelekhupele e mo go yone batsenelela tshimolodiso ya madirelo a, mo go bone bale bararo ba neng ba ikgapela ditsidifatsi tse dinnye."
"Gongwe ba ne ba tshaba se se tona, sa Cornwall, se se neng se disitse tse dingwe mo mosepeleng."
"Gongwe o ka botsa gore, tshipi e, go a bo go tlhatswiwa efe, e tlhatswiwa jang?"
"Gongwe Soares o re raya a re ga le a ntheetsa, ga le a nkutlwa, ga le a ntlhaloganya."
"Go ntse go ntse jalo, e ka re fa motho mongwe a fetsa go bua, yo mongwe a re o iteela mafoko a motho yoo kobo moroko."
"Go ntse jalo ka seatla."
"Go rata Sekgoa mo le bone botlhale bo bo bolelwang bole, di felele kae?"
"Gore a mangwe ale a ne a thusiwa jang, ga go bolelwe."
"Gore bana ba ithute sentle, ke gore go bo go didimetse, go se na modumo fa tlase ga bone."
"Gore re kgone se, mongwe le mongwe wa rona o tshwanetse a itlama le ineela mo tirong ya gagwe go kgontsha se batho ba se solofelang."
"Go setse gole mo mpepeneng gore Masisi o na le lekunutu la gagwe le le mo thusang go ipapatsa fa Molefhi le ene a na le lekgamu la gagwe le le mo bapatsang."
"Go supagetse gape fa morafe o, o kgona go itirela mafura aa jewang aa tswang mo madileng a go tlhalositsweng fa a bitswa Ngondivi."
"Go thulana ga dikepe mo ntweng le go swa ga masole ga se tirafalo e gantsi e tlhotlhomisiwang."
"Go tlaabo go na le dithuto, tlhatlhobelo malwetse le isthidilo mmele."
"Go tlhoka lefelo le re ikatisetsang kwa go lone."
"Go tsene ka fa, go tswe ka kwa, go felele go ya le phefo."
"Go tshwanetse ga nna jalo tlhabololo e tshwanela go tlhofofaletsa badirisi tiro."
"Go twe, go ja dijo mo go feteletseng, go felela go tlisitse malwetse a gongwe a ka bong a se yo, jaaka sukiri, madi a matona le bolwetse jwa pelo."
"Go twe, ‘Meika shuo gore dipotsane di nole.’"
"Go ultwala fa morui mongwe kwa Kgalagadi a ne a bona tiragalo ya go nna jaana, a amogwa loruo lwa gagwe ke leuba."
"Go utlwala fa mokgatlho o, o leka go batla ditsela dingwe tsa go ka rarabolola dilo dingwe tse di amang matshelo a basadi."
"Go utlwala fa mopalamente wa kgaolo le ene a ne a le kwa Mogonye fa go ntshiwa pego ya VDC."
"Go utlwala gore mme mmaagwe o ne gakgamala fa a mo utlwa e le la ntlha a re “mama.”"
"Go ya ka bogogi jwa motse wa Mabuo, Sajene Kerupile ke sekai se sentle sa go dira ka boineelo."
"Go ya ka Naledi, dithotse, fela jaaka maungo a tsone, di na le dikotla tse di farologanyeng tse di agang mmele."

"Goyapelegolebegafamoletlowa Son oftheSoilotlaategalegofeta goyaka dipalo tsa ngwaga ono."

"Jaaka go ne go solofetswe gore ntwa e tla a nna ya masetla dibete, bogolo jang fa gare lekgotla la barutabana le puso, se ke sone se se ileng sa dirafala."
"Jaaka gongwe mo kgweleng ya dinao, dikompone di santse di le boutsana go tswela mo tswaing, ba ema nokeng mekgatlho e gore e godise segarona."
"Jaaka le Tautona Khama a setse a laetse, a moretlwa o lele mo baneng le baithuting go ba tsenya mo mekgweng le dingwaong tsa Setswana go re isa kwa Botswaneng yo re tlaa nnang motlotlo ka ene isago."
"Jaaka re buile fa godimo fale, kgang e ya lengana e bolelwa ke Naledi (23 Lwetse 2015)."
"Jaanong, Naledi e tla latedisa ditiragalo tseo le gore ke eng lefatshe la Botswana le a mangwe a ne a lemoga botlhokwa jo seabe se baithuti bao, baneng ba nna le sone gore lefatshe leo le bo lele mo thitibalong e leleng mo go yone dingwaga tseno."
"Jaanong puo ke ya mahutsana kgwedi eno."
"Ka ba fitlhetse go se na le fa ele sepe, go tlaa twe batho ba, ba ne ba wela maupong, kgotsa go twe ba wetse maupong."
"Ka bo metsi, boloko bo ka tima molelo oo."
"Ka bona sentle gore batho ba ba tsaya gore ke moruti, ka leba Mosa, ene a jele kgakge, o ka re motho a bone noga ya majwe."
"Ka botlhano jwa tsone, di tla kopana le tse supa gotswa ka botlhaba ko legatong la bobedi."
"Ka dinako tse dingwe ba ne ba a tle ba tshware bangwe ba rona mme ba ba latlhele mo diseleng."
"Ka e sale ke kgaogane le rraagwe ke ne ka iponela rrenyana ebile o mpha lerato le ene ngwana tota oa mo tlhokomela."
"Ka feta ka mo rolela selelo sa me, a dumelana le nna go re re ye gae mmogo gore a nkimolole lehuma ka a ne a lefilwe sentle."
"Ka go atolosa boleng jwa Setswana, re leka gape go tiisa ipapatso go itepatepanya le ee dirisiwang mo dipuong tse dingwe tse go kwalwang dikoranta ka tsone."
"Ka gotwe mmamotse o bonwa mmantlwaneng, a re o sale a itshupa gore ke moopedi wa tlhwatlhwa a sale mmotlana."
"Kago ya kokelo ya Tsabong e tlhomamisitswe BDP e gatile monwana wa kgonope?"
"Ka jalo a tia moko le go gola mo leratong la tiro ya gagwe."
"Ka jalo bareki bane ba busa dijo tse di tshupa le fa badiri ba koporase ba ne ba tlhomamisitse fa nako ya tsone ya tiriso e ise e fete ka nako ya fa ba di reka."
"Ka jalo, batho ba tshwanetse go sidilwa ditlhaloganyo go ba baakanyetsa tlhatlhobo, ga mmogo le gore maduo a ka raya eng."
"Ka jalo bontsi jwa dikitso le ditso tsa Setswana ke dumela gore di simolotse go tsena ka lenga la seloko fa makgoa a ne tla ka dikitso le dingwao tsa bone."
"Ka jalo ga go thona go bo Mothusatautona wa nako eno Mokgweetsi Masisi a mo abetse tlotla ya Naledi ya Botswana."
"Ka jalo ke mo tsaya jaaka mogaka le moswela tumelo."
"Ka jalo, se leba kwa liking ya bobedi mme bogogi jwa sone jwa nako eno bo bolela fa ba amogetse go tlhoka go dira sentle mme ba tlaa ya go ikaga sesha kwa liking ya bobedi."
"Ka kgwebo ya me ke kgonne go reka dipodi di le pedi tse di namagadi tse mo nakong eno di ikokeditseng.”"
"Ka leka go tlhalosa mme a se ka a dumela gore koko e ka bitswa ka tau."
"Ka mabaka mangwe, e ka re fa moeng a fetsa go ja a tsamaya."

"Ka mmatla kgwana a sa robale, nkuku yo wa senatla a tsweledisa dithuto ka tlhaeletsano mme ke gone e rile morago a ya sekoleng ngwaga tse pedi kwa Soviet Union, e mo nakong eno e itsege ka la Russia."
"Ka molao wa lekgotlana le, gore ngwana a atlege mo ditlhatlhobong, o ne a sa tshwanela go tlogela Sekgoa kwa morago."
"Ka monyenyo wa phenyo a tshikinya molwetsiwa gagwe a mmitsa ka leina mme a mo tlhomamisetsa fa a tla a siama morago ga diouranyana."
"Kamoso ba nyala yo, fa le phirima ba nyala o sele."
"Ka motsotso wa masome a mararo le botlhano, Skoon Boys ya abelwa thago e khutswane kwa ntle ga mola wa mathibelo a Sharps mme motshamiki wa Skoon Boys wa sekipa sa boraro a lekalekanya dino go nna, ele nngwe ya Sharps le ele nngwe ya Skoon Boys."
"Kana bana ba ba ne ba hutsegile kana jang!"
"Kana bana ba batla madi,” ga bua Kabelo."
"Kana ga twe dikereke di ntshe madi le baeteledipele botlhe ba setshaba."
"Kana gatwe go tholwa ga monna ga se go lema dinaka."

"Ka nako ya borobabobedi mo mosong batho ba ne ba setse ba saila mo kgotleng ya Mpeo ko Lerala, ba mo emetse ka matlho a mahibidu monyadi wa bone."

"Ka nnete Matebele ba ne ba setse fela ba iphotlhere jaaka koko e faladitswe ke phakalane."

"Kapoteni Yardley ga twe o dirile tiro ya gagwe ka fa tshwanelong."
"Karabo a re o leboga bagolwane ba BTV, ba tshwana Linet Habana yoo eteletseng metshameko."
"Ka sekai sa rona, Morwadi ke ene magetla marwalela ba bangwe."
"Ka tiro tota e ne e le go tlhagola, ba tlhola kwa tshimong ba lwa nao mhero."
"Ka tlhomamo, go tsenelela, ke go tsena fa o sa tshwanelang, kgotsa fa o sa letlelelweng go ka bo o le teng."
"Ka tota potso e ne e le gore, makwati ke eng, ra tlhalosa gore makwati a tshwana fela le letlalo la phologolo."
"Ka tswa mosadi yo maswe lerato le ile."

"Ke eng re sa e baakanye ka go a bonala gore e re timeditse?"

"“ Ke fitlhetse Mogorosi Baatweng mo a le mo moweng mme ka mo lebelela."

"Ke go gakolola go begela masika kana ba boipelego ba tle ba go thuse go bona tharabololo ya mathata a gago., Human Papilloma Virus (HPV) Vaccination against cervical cancer starts on February 23-27."

"Ke mo botlhokong Ke mosetsana wa dingwaga tse di masome mabedi."

"Ke molemo, a tshwana fela le a tonki.”"
"Ke motho yo o ntseng jang?"
"Ke ne ka isa kgang e kwa ga bone mme ba seka ba ntsaya tsia."

"“Ke ne ke dira jalo go itlhaganela go fudugela kwa game ke tshaba kgokgontsho,” Obolokile a rialo."
"“Ke ne ke rata thata lentswe le le nonofileng la ga Esther Kanaimba Senai a bala dikgang."

"Ke ngwana wa bone mo baneng ba ba neng ba supa ba ga Rre Sekati le Mme Mmapelo Masimolole ba kgotla ya Bobididi gone mo Mogoditshane."

"“ Ke sale ke tlhatlhetse dikgomo tsa kwa ’ a etsho monna nte ke yo ’o di bolotsa."
"Ke selo se se dirang tiro e go buiwang ka yone, tiro ya go leboga."
"Ke simolotse tiro fela go sena mathata mme e ne ya re morago ga kgwedi tse pedi ke fa e tla a re ke robetse ke fa rre yoo a tla a itatlhela mo dikobong tsame a bo a robala le nna ntle le go nthaya lefoko."
"Ke sone ba feleleditseng ba ipitsa Digoja."
"Ke sone seo pina ya gagwe ya boraro eleng Re a Kolota."

"Kgang e nngwe ya nna gore re fapaanele go duela modisa."

"Kgang ya tlhoka yo o ka e atlholang."
"Kgato ya bone (4) – Kwa Maruapula; Duke Machobane a sule, Peter ‘Pat Mofoka wa dingwaga tse thataro le ene a sule."
"Kgato ya Borobabongwe le lesome (9 & 10) – Kwa Tlokweng, ntlo e hudilwe mme Thamsanqa Mnyele a bolailwe fa Moitse Botshelo le Prince ba golafetse."
"Kgosi a re go lebelwa kwa tlase ga merafe e tshwana le ya Basarwa le fa ba leka go supa ngongorego ka seemo se, ba tsweletse ka sa reediwe ke boeteledipele jwa lefatshe leno mme e bile ba setse ba kgobega marapo le go feta."
"Kgosi a re sengwe gape se ba se lemogileng e le bagogi ba motse ke go nna matlhomatlho ga bana ba basetsana, mo e reng le fa ba imile ba bo ba sa itse gore ba imisitswe ke bomang."
"Kgosi Kgari III o supile fa tiro ya lekoko leo e le go kgalema, go rotloetsa boitsholo jo bontle ga mmogo le bogakolodi jwa boitseanape."
"Kgosi Maforaga, yo a neng a lebega a setse a fedile pelo, o ne a kopa morafe go farologanya dikgang tse di amang komiti ya ditlhabololo tsa motse, makhanselara, mapalamente, le tse di amang dikgosi."
"Kgosi Mosinyi a re bone e le Bakaa, ba ne ba solofetse gore fa go agiwa letamo la Bokaa, lenyora le tlaa fela, mme ba swaba go bona le bile le oketsegile thata."
"Kgosi o kaile fa morafe o amogetse ditlhabololo tse ka dipelo tse di tsweu mme ba santse ba na le keletso ya gore lefelo le ka atolosiwa, go oketsa ditirelo ka go atumetsa diofisi tsa maphata a manngwe a puso jaaka la dituelo tsa makgetho."

5727	Le fa go ntse jalo, go lemogwa ga dipharologano tse di nweleletseng tsa ditso, fa di itlhagisa ka dikgotlhang tse dinnye, go fetoga tlhaolele ka bonako.
5728	Le fa go ntse jalo, go na le ditšhono mo intasetering, bobedi ka ntlha ya kgolo le dipeeletso tsa isago.
5729	Le fa go ntse jalo, go na le tsholofelo ya gore dilo di tla tokafala.
5730	Le fa go ntse jalo, jono ke boemo jo bo sa itumediseng gotlhelele.
5731	Le fa go ntse jalo, ka dinako tse dingwe, ditiro tsa rona tsa go nna le seabe mo baaging (tse di jaaka lenaneo la la Thulaganyetso Botshelo) di re lemotsha dikgwetlho tse baagi ba lebaneng le tsone.
5732	Le fa go ntse jalo, ka nako e le nngwe fela, kontinente eno e tlile go bona koketsego e kgolo thata ya batho ba ba tsofetseng mo dingwageng tse 30 tse di latelang.
5733	Le fa go ntse jalo, ka nako ya malatsi a boikhutso a selemo, o solofelwa ke go bontsha bokgoni ka bonnye jo bo kgonagalang.
5734	Le fa go ntse jalo, leloko e ne e le setlhopha se se bophara thata go feta setlhopha sa bonna, se gantsi se neng se na le botlhokwa thata ka selegae.
5735	Le fa go ntse jalo, mokgwa wa tlwaelo wa go lema o ka fetola popego ya mmu le go tlhola kgogolego ya mmu.
5736	Le fa go ntse jalo, Molao ono, ga o ka ke wa sireletsa motho fa a sa tseye matsapa a go itshireletsa.
5737	Le fa gontse jalo Mourvèdre e tsweletse go gola mo Bandol, kgaolo mo borwa jwa Rhone e supileng bokgoni jwa go fenya dinta tsa diterebe ka ntlha ya motlhaba.
5738	Le fa go ntse jalo, mo YBB, re tlhomile mogopolo mo badiring ka rona le keletso ya rona ya go rotloetsa go tlhokomelana mo yunibesiting.
5739	Le fa go ntse jalo, ntshokuno ya leungo la drakone kwa kgwebong mo Aforika Borwa e tla go gola mo magareng ga 2019 le 2021 jaaka fa dijalo tša ntshokuno tse di ntšhwa.
5740	Le fa go ntse jalo, o tshwenyega ka dikarolo dingwe tsa boitekanelo tse a akanyang gore go tshwanetse ga dirwa sengwe ka tsone.
5741	Le fa go ntse jalo, puso ya bosetšhaba ga e pateletsege go duela diporofense kgotsa bommasepala ba ba sa kgobokanyeng lotseno go tsamaelana le bokgoni le selekanyo sa lekgetho.
5742	Le fa go ntse jalo, re tshwanetse go gakologelwa gore go tsenngwa tirisong ga yone go tla dirwa kgato ka kgato, go tla tsaya dingwaga di le mmalwa tse di latelang.
5743	Le fa go ntse jalo, seno se batla gore motho a tseye kgato ka bopelokgale le ka mowa wa go nna le tsholofelo.
5744	Le fa go ntse jalo, seno se batlile se sa direge gotlhelele.
5745	Le fa go ntse jalo, setheo sa dikhomphutara se ne sa ganana le ntlha eo mme sa re go e baakanya go tla ja R8 000. Christi o ne a se ka a amogela seo mme a tsaya ditokomane tse di tlhokegang le kgakololo ya semolao.
5746	Le fa go ntse jalo, thulaganyo ya go rekisa ka thuso ya bagwebi/bafopholetsi ba dipodi ba tswelela ka dingwaga tse dintsi.
5747	Le fa go ntse jalo, tiriso ya mmedia wa botsalano e tsamaisana le boikarabelo jwa YBB jwa go sireletsa Molaotheo wa naga ya rona le go o tsweledisetsa pele.
5748	Le fa go ntse jalo, tota le fa a ne a sa e rate, o ne a nna mogaka mo go yone.
5749	Le fa go ntse jalo, Tutu a nna a tiile mpo kemong ya gagwe gore kgethololo ka mabaka a thobalano e lekana le kgethololo ka ntlha ya lotso kgotsa bong.
5750	Le fa Indaba e sa tlhole e le teng, setlhopha se se leng kwa Ofising ya Tokafatso ya Boleng se solofetsa gore go tla nna le matsholo a mantšha mo ngwageng ono go thiba phatlha eno ka one.
5751	Le fa jono e le boemo jo bo gwetlhang, ke tla leka ka natla go kaela legoro kwa ntle ga go fitlha sepe le ka boikanyegi.
5752	Le fa ka dinako tse di fitileng dikgosi ka dinako tse dingwe di ne di fitlhwa mo lotshitshign lwa noka kgotsa kwa sekgweng, ditlhogo tsa malapa di ne di bolokiwa mo lesakeng la dikgomo gaufi le kgoro.
5753	Le fa karolo ya ntshô-tlhagiso e fokotsegile thata fa dingwaga di ntse di feta, merara e santse e bonwa mo bontsing jwa dikgaolo tse di tlhagisang mofeine mo nageng.
5754	Le fa ka tlwaelo di tlhatsa gangwe ka ngwaga, go na le dinako tse mo go tsona go nnileng le ditlhatsô di le pedi ka ngwaga tse di gatisitsweng.
5755	Le fa ke bolelelwa gore tsela ya tikologo e bokete thata e bile e matlapa, e direlwe jaaka tsela ya sekgoreletsi mo go wena se le mo motšheneng wa gago.
5756	“Le fa ke sa ntse ke le mmatlisisi yo mmotlana, ke leka go araba dipotso tsa ikonomi ka boikokobetso jo ke tsayang gore ga bo yo mo tirong eno ya seporofešenale.

atlegile mo botshelong leboge ba ba go thusitseng fa ne le mo mathateng mookodi wa pula beelediwa ntlheng tsotlhe botshelo bo lekwa ka maano otlhe moremogolo go betlwa wa taola wa motho ipetla motho sengwe be inkantse se sengwe motho ga itsewe se naga le fa motho ka iponatsha siame ga kake wa itse maikaelelo gagwe motshega kgarebe ke monyadi wa yona motho yo nyatsang selo ka tsoga se dira ngwana ntae ke go lae tlhogoputswa ga se molao mogolo ka ithuta sengwe go tswa mo ngwnaneng ga se gore fa ele mogolo tla nna nepile ngwana yo sa leleng swela tharing motho yo sa tlhagiseng mathata gagwe ga kitla bona thuso ngwana yo tlhogo kgolo sira rragwe ngwana yo se nang maitseo palela motsadi wa gagwe nna nkgokgotha leselo seupe ke go kgomaretse se bone nong go rakalala godimo go ya tlase ke ga yone motho le fa ka nna le madi kgotsa botshelo jo bontle jang kgotsa jang go ya tlase ga gagwe go tla tswa mo go reng itshotse jang le gore tshotse batho bangwe jang teng godimo koo se bone thola borethe teng ga yone go baba ga se gore motho fa le montlentle le mekgwa ya gagwe ntse fela jalo se tshege yo we leng mareledi sa le pele se ka wa re fa bona mongwe tlhagetswe ke tsietsi wa sotla ka mokgwa ga latlhe motho ga nke latlha mekgwa ya gagwe phiri rile ga bo se gangwe motho fa kgobokantse ipeela naganele ka moso phokojwe ga ke latlha mosesele le wa yona motho ga nke latlha mekgwa ya gagwe phokoje go tshela yo dithetsenyana motho go tshela yo botlhale pinyana fa re ping bo utlwile tse di kgolo ngwana fa bua sengwe bo utlwile mo go ba bagolo seboba re bata sa mokwatla sa mpa re mpampetsa ka itshwarela mo ga eno go na le motswakwa bodu se lekwa ka legano sa nko se latsa le naga mathata kgotlang rarabololwa ka go bua eseng go ngalelana sedikwa setshswarwa ke ntš pedi ga se thata tiro ga nke pala fa tlhakanetswe tlhakanelwa sekukuni se bonwa ke sebataladi fa motho dira sengwe ithaya re iphitlhile mongwe mmona setoto setopo se bitsa manong kwa kgora leng teng batho ba nna bantsi setopo re supa sa nakedi magogwe re mmega sule legodu le tshwarwang ka merwalo seyabogwe se tletse se boa se tletse fa se ngame kgotsa fa thusa ba bangwe ka dilo tsa gago le bona ba tla go tshola ka mokgwa oo susu ilela suswane gore suswane tle mo ilele fa le kwa godimo ka maemo tswhanetse go rekegela ba ba botlana mo go wena tadi amusa motshegare mogolo sethoboloko thupa go fedile ya dikgomo ga sala ya batho bana ba tshwanetse go aga ba kgalemelwa ba sa lomelediwe tau iphutha metlhala le nosi na le bana malawana mafaratlhatlha tau se na ng seboka siiwa ke none tlhotsa fa batho ba se seoposengwe ba ka se kgone tiro tau ga ke ja ngwana sa mo tsala motho yo se nang kamano le wena ga se gantsi ka go direla molemo tedutshweu ga se botsofe setshwano sa motho se na le go go tsietsa thebe ya sebodu ke leleme motlapa itshereletsa ka go bua thata thotana se nang khudutlou bolobete ba ipha naga batho gantsi ba itaola fa moeteledipele se yo thubisi ga bonwe bonwa ke motsogapele selo "location of maun in botswana maun ke toropo ya ngamiland maun ke motse mogolo wa bokone bophirima lefelo le le itsegeng ka leina la ngamiland mo lefatsheng la botswana motse wa maun na le batho ba ka tshwara dikete tse makgolo matlhano dipalo tse di dirwa ke merafhe ee farologanyeng fitlhelwa gone mo motseng wa maun banni ba motse wa maun maun merafe ya motse wa maun akaretsa batawana ba ba tshwereng se tilo sa bogosi jwa motse wa maun bayei basarwa le banbukushu go tswa go lowe kgosi ya motse wa maun tswa mo morafeng wa batawana kgosi ya ntlha ya motse wa maun ne ele letsholathe ii yo irileng go thokafaleng ga gagwe go tse ngwana wa gagwe bong tawana moremi kgosi tawana moremi tshwareletswe bogosi ke kgeetsedie bong kealitile moremi tsela go tshelwang ka yone mo maun maun ke lengwe la mahelo aa humileng ka ditsatholego mo lefatsheng la botswana banni ba motse wa maun ba tshela ka go lema go tswa bogologolong merafhe ya bayei batawana ke batho ba ba digogang ko pele mo temong dijo tse di lemiwang di akaretsa magapu maraka mabele mmedi le tse dingwe ke tsela batho ba itirelang dijo ka teng go lema go dirwa fela ka paka ya dipula ee simolong ngwaga ya fifing di dirisiwa tsa temo di akaretsa dikgomo ditonki le megoma bosêng batswana ba motse wa maun ba lema ka terekere ga bangwe ntse ba tshwere mo mokgweng wa maloba godimo ga moo batho ba motse wa maun ke barui ba dikgomo ke ka mong motse wa maun ele mengwe ya metse ee nang le dikgomo tse dintsi mo lefatsheng la botswana thuo mo motseng ga se ya kgomo hela ke ya leruo lotlhe ka kakaretso ebong dipodi dihutshane dipitse le ditonki hela jalo leruo le lone fela jalo ke motswedi wa dijo jaaka batho ba bona masi mo dkgomong le dipodi ke sa lebale le nama ditsatholego mo motseng go fitlhelwa mantle entle tholego akaretsa mefuta ya dithare tse di farologanyeng jaaka dithare tsa maungo ebong motshaba motsetsentsela moroja moretologa le tse dingwe tse dintsi le dithare tse di jewang ke leruo fela jalo le majang farologanyeng gona le losika la dithare tsa mengana ebong mogotho mongana le mosu mefuta ya bojang akaretsa phoka mokakama le mengwe motse wa maun kgabile ka motswedi wa metsi aa elelang ebong noka ya thamalakane ee tisang botshelo mo motseng wa maun bojanala mo maun motse wa maun tumile thata ka go nna kgoro ya bojanala mo lefatsheng la botswana maun ke motse ditsela di nna mafaratlhatlha teng ka gore bajanala ba feta ka maun goya okavango delta ga mmogo le bo chobe national park le mafelo mangwe jalo jalo maun le mafelo amogelang bajanala aa maemo ntlha jaaka bo sedie hotel maun lodge rileys hotel kamanga lodge le amangwe ke ka nankolo ka tatsa tsebe thamalakane river noka ya thamalakane bonwa mo lefatsheng la botswana mo africa mo motseng wa maun kwa bofelong jwa borwa jwa makgobokgobong okavango noka ya thamalakane ke mengwe ya metswedi ya noka ya okavango noka ya thamalakane nale diphologolo tsa metsi bong dikwena dikubu le dithapi noka thamalakane ke ngwe ya ditsatholego tse leng tsone di kang bajanala go tla mo motseng wa maun noka ke yone tlokafatsang matshelo banni ba motse wa maun ka ba thamela ditiro gape ba thusa ka dithapi le tswii ka ele dingwe tsa dijo tse ba tshelang ka tsone banni ba maun ba dirisa noka go itlhabisa phefo ka nako ya thamalakane dikolo tse di fithelweng mo motseng wa maun mo motseng wa maun go nale dikolo dile mmalwa tse di fithelweng mo motseng go fithelwa dikolo ka go farologana mo motseng tsa dithuto primary schools tse di potlana le tse di fa godingwana juniour schools le tse di tlhagolelang tsela goya ko bo godingwana senior schools le tsa bo mma dikolo univesities le tsa ithutelo tiro ya diatla dikolo tse di potlana tse di fithelwang teng ke tse di latelang bonatla mathiba letsholathebe moremi botshwelelo sekgoma boyei matola "botlhatlogo ke motsana yo mo kgaolong ya bokone bophirima jwa botswana kwa borwa gobapa le makgobokgobo okavango le ngami gape na le sekolo se se botlana mo palo bathong ya ngwaga wa dipalo di ne dile makgolo mane le masome marataro le bosupa dikgotlhang tsa motse wa batlhatlogo baagi ba botlhatlogo le toteng ba supile lekgotla la kabo ditsha la tawana ka monwana ba re le aba dipolasi mo lefatsheng la morafe kwa ntle gago rerisanya nabo ba ikuetse mo mopalamenteng wa bone rre taolo habano gore metse ya bone dikilogilwe ke dipolasi tse disha tse di tsere mafudiso morafe mongwe wa baagi ba botlhatlogo rre gositwang phiritswana tlhalositse fa ba sa tlhole ba kgona go rua sentle ka mafudiso bone tserwe ke bo radipolase le mororo bane ba itse fa lefatshe ele la morafe otlhe ke kopa lo sekaseke dipolase tse fa dikgomo tsa rona di tsene mo teng re tshaba go go di tsaa ka ke polasi ya mong ga bua rre phiritswana rre amerika sebetwane wa toteng ene kopile mopalamente wa kgaolo go ba kopela tona yo lebaganeng go tla go ba tlhalosetsa gore tota gatwe ba tshele jang rre sebetwane tlhalositse fa go ka bo go le molemo fa dipolase tseo di kabo di kgaogangwa mme tsa abelwa merafe ya metse eo ka go tserwe mafudiso bone mongwe wa bagodi ba motse wa botlhatlogo rre jospeph melere re ene gakgamadiwa ke gore ere ntswa metse ya bone dikilogilwe ke dipolase tsa haina veld le moepo mosha wa kopore lekgotla la kabo ditsha le santse le aba sekidi se se setseng sa lefatshe mme fa bana ba botlhatlogo bare ba kopa lefatshe ba tewa gotwe ga leyo ga bua rre melere re swabisiwa ke fa lephata la kabo ditsha la tawana le berekisanyang le bone ka teng ka le palelwa ke go rerisanya nabo fa le tsaya ditswetso bangwe baagi ba metse eo ba ile ba supa batlhokomedi ba lefatshe ka monwana bare ba lekunutu le lekgotla la kabo ditsha le bo radipolasi bao mme ba re ba belaela fa go katswa go dirisiwa maretshwa mangwe go amoga morafe lefatshe fa tswa la gagwe mopalamente rre habano kaile fa mathata batho ba metse eo bakwa ke gore gaba tsee tsia dikomiti tsa metse ya bone tsa ditlhabololo kaile fa morafe rwele maikarabelo go bona gore lefatshe le abiwa jang ka ba na le boemedi jo eleng maloko le batlhokomedi ba lefatshe ba ba berekisanyang le lephata la kabo ditsha babo ba supe fa ele ruri lefatshe le ka abiwa rre habano ile gatelela mafoko gagwe ka gore baemedi ba lefatshe ke bana ba lona ba tlhotshwa ke lona mopalamente rre habano one le mo loetong la go buisanya le batlhophi ba kgaolo ya gagwe ya ngami ka tsa palamente ee fetileng le go tsaya megolopo dikgoge tsa kwa ntle botswana batlhatlogo dipadi tse dingwe"
"fa motse wa letlhakane leng teng mo botswana letlhakane ke motse selegae mo kgaolo ya legare ya botswana mo borwa jwa mmatshumo ebile motse selegae wa letlhakane one nale batho bale dikete dile lesome le bone makgolo le borobabongwe ka palobatho ya ngwaga wa go nale meepo ya diteemane le meraro bong moepo wa letlhakane kafa borwa botlhaba orapa kafa bokone bophirima le damtshaa kafa bokone dikhilomethara dile lesome le botlhano go tse lesome le bobedi go tswa letlhakane okametsweng ke debswana ba gakololwa go ipeela mesasana mokhanselara wa orapa rre balopi chilume gakolotse banni ba toropo eo gore orapa ga se legae la bone mme re ba tshwanetse ba leka ka natla go ipeela mesasana mokhanselara chilume buile seo bosheng fa ne buisa phuthego kwa kgotleng ya orapa rotloetsa banni ba toropo eo go ikemela ka dinao go bona gore ba batla ditsha tsa bonno go itirela bokamoso le ba malwapa bone rre chilume ne ba gakolola gape gore ba tshwanetse ba leka ka natla go ipolokela kwa dipolokelong go dira gore ba nne le se ba ka itshetsang ka sone fa ba dule mo tirong mo go tse dingwe mogolwane go tswa ka lephateng la merero ya kgwebo rre samuel suping ne tlhalosetsa banni ka ditirelo tsa lekalana leo mme supa fa baikopedi ba setlankana sa go rekisa mo mekgwatheng ba lopiwa madi kana ka dipula tse di masome mabedi re setlankana seo se letlelelwa go dirisiwa fela mo kgaolong ya boteti fa rre resego boitumelo moemedi kwa lekalaneng la tiragatso melao ne tlhalosa gore tiro ya bone ke go tlhomamisa gore tumalano moikopedi dirileng le ba lekalana la merero ya kgwebo diragadiwa supa fa ba tshwanetse ba fitlhela maina le setshwantsho sa moikopedi mo setlankaneng sa gagwe re ga ba tshwanela go tsaya teseletso kgotsa setlankana ba bo ba se neela morekisi yo mongwe se itirisetsa tsweletse sedimosa go re katlholo ya go rekisa se na teseletso ka lopa madi kana ka dikete tse tlhano tsa dipula ne tlhalosa gape fa go tlaa nna le taolo ya thekiso ya majalwa setso bileng letlelesega mme re majalwa ao akaretsa mokuru khadi morula setopoti le ila rre boitumelo boletse fa majalwa ao otlhe tlaa rekisiwa go simolola ka nako ya bobedi mo tshokologong go fitlha ka nako ya borataro mo maitseboeng ka malatsi fa gare ga beke thekiso ya dilwana ka labotlhano le ka matlhatso go tlaa rekisiwa go simolola ka nako ya sethoboloko go fitlha ka nako ya bosupa mo maitseboeng mme ka tshipi go tlaa rekisiwa ka nako ya boraro mo tshokologong go fitlha ka nako ya borataro mo maitseboeng fa akgela mongwe wa banni rre tshekatsheko ne supa ngongorego ya gore fa ba kopile teseletso ya go rekisa kwa lephateng la merero ya kgwebo ba ofisi ya orapa enterprise ba fokotsa palo ya dilwana tse di letleletsweng go ka di rekisa mongwe wa banni ne botsa gore ba tlhokega teseletso fa ba rekisa dijo tsa letlhafula fa araba rre suping ne gakolola gore ba tshwanetse ba botsisisa fa ba sa itse molao tlhalosa fa toropo ya orapa le lefelo la mong wa lone ka jalo re ba tshwanetse ba sala morago ditaelo tsotlhe tse di lopiwang mo go bone ne tlhalosa gape gore dijo tsotlhe tsa temo ga di tlhoke teseletso go di rekisa mme re fa le tse motho di rekang bo di rekisa di tlhoka teseletso dikgoge tsa kwa ntle botswana letlhakane botswana boteti region dipadi tse dingwe"

"go senyegelwa ke boimana go senya bomana go ka tlhalosiwa fa ele go khutisa boimana ka go ntsha losea mo popelong pele ga nako ya lone ya go tsholwa go senyega gwa boimana go gabedi boimana bo ka ba ba khutisang boimana ka metlhale sa babalesegang di gatisiwa ngwaga le ngwaga mafatshe otlhe ga mmogo le dipalo tsa dikete kete tse tlhano million tsa bomme ba ba felelang bana le bogole palo ya bomme ba ba senyegelwang ke boimana ngwaga le ngwaga go akarediwa le ba ba senyegelwang ka ga molaong ka tshwara dikete kete tse di masome mane le bobedi million fa mo go tsone dikete kete tse di masome mabedi million ele tsa ba ba khutisang boimana ka itetlo mafatshe otlhe ka bophara forty percent of the world women are able to access therapeutic and elective abortions within gestational limits tshenyo ya boimana eseng kaga molao go lobaka diragala ka go bo kukeletswa ke metlhale mentsi tshwana le bo go dirisadi tlhatsana tsa kalafi di dirisiwa tse di loweditsweng le mengwe metlhale access to family planning education and contraceptive services has increased mefuta ya go senyegelwa ke boimana go senyega ga boimana ka itetlo go senyega ga boimana mo mafatshe fatshe go ka tshwara tlhola malatsi le boferabongwe ka ngwaga wa morago ga go latlhegelwa ke ditlhopho tse di potlana tsa botswana democratic party bdp ko palapye tlou ne tswanelwa ke go rola marapo ka letsatsi la ntlha nang le aids le go thusa batho ba ba nang le hiv gore ba amogele seemo sa bone gore ba tswelele le matshelo bone dietsele may anna reynvaan prize and gave prize lecture netherlands september "lesoma ke motsana yo mo kgaolong ya bokone bophirima jwa botswana mo kgaolong botlhaba jwa kgaolo rileng moragonyana ga ngwaga wa wa aga kgaolo ya chobe gape bapile le toropo ya kasane lesoma nale sekolo se se potana gotlhe le se se golwane gape palo ya batho ne le makgolo mane le lesome ka palo batho ya ngwaga wa baruti ba nale seabe mo go gakatseng mogare kwa lesoma baruti ba bangwe kwa merapelong eo ba ne ba supa gore baeteledipele bangwe ba dikereke le bone ba na le seabe mo go gakatseng go anama ga mogare wa hiv ka jaana ba ratana le bana ba phuthego ba le bantsiba bile ba ikuela mo baruting gore nne sekao mo diphuthegong tsa bone ka go lwantsha kanamo ya mogare wa hiv ba re seo se ka diragala fela fa ba emisa go nna le bakapelo ba le bantsi kgang nngwe ba boletseng fa tshwenya ke ya gore baruti bangwe ba na le mokgwa sa siamang wa go rotloetsa balatedi ba bone go emisa go tswelela ba nwa dipilisi tsa di arv mme ba re seo se borai ka jaana batho ba go nna jalo ba felela ba tlhokafetse ba bile ba tlhalosa gore dipilisi tsa di arv di direletswe go nowa botshelo jotlhe ka jalo ba ikuetse mo baruting ba go nna jalo go emisa go dira jalo ne ya re mokhanselara wa kazungula lesoma rre baboloki mpebe fa malebo supa fa bokopano ja mohuta oo bo le botlhokwa mo go thuseng mmuso go lwantsha mogare wa hiv le aids rre mpebe bile ikuela mo baeteleding pele ba dikereke tse di farologanyeng mo kgaolong ya chobe gore ba fetole kgang eo seo modiro re bogolo ba nne ba kokoana dikgwedi dingwe le dingwe tse tharo go rapedisa mogare dikgoge tsa kwa ntle botswana kasane lesoma www gov bw botswana lesoma dipadi tse dingwe"
"kopong ke motsana mo kgaolong ya kweneng mo botswana dikhilomethara tse di masome mabedi le botlhano go dikologa gaborone toropokgolo ya botswana palo tsa batho di ne di le makgolokgolo matlhano makgolo matlhano le masome bosupa le motso mo palo bathong ya ngwaga wa mme se sa dira gore nne mo legatong la borataro la nngwe ya metse metona mo kweneng ditlhabololo di tlisiwa kwa motseng wa kopong banni ba motse wa kopong ba iteetse legofi dikago tsa motlobo wa dibuka tse di tlaa agiwang kwa motseng oo ke lekgotla lengwe la baithaopi go tswa kwa amerika la rothchild foundation tse di tlaa lopang madi fetang kgosi michael molefe wa motse oo supile boitumelo kwa phuthegong ya kgotla amogela le go lekodisa mopalamente wa kgaolo ya kweneng botlhaba rre moeng pheto ka dingwe tsa dikgang tsa motse oo boletse fa ba setse ba bone setsha se dikago tseo di tlaa agiwang mo go sone ba re ba solofela fa tshimolodiso ya dikago tseo ka nna nako nngwe mo kgweding tlang kgosi molefe kgothaditse batho ba motse oo go nna le seabe mo tirong eo ka jaana dikago tseo tlaa bo le bontlha bongwe jwa ditlhabololo tse di tlaa tlotlomatsang motse wa bone re ba dumalane gore mongwe le mongwe mo motseng oo ntshe le seabe sa gagwe re bana ba dikole le bone ba atlile thata mogopolo oo le gore bangwe ba setse ba simolotse go ntsha re baithaopi bao gape ba boletse fa ba ba nnileng le seabe ba tlaa neelwa karata le sesupo sa seabe mo kagong eo rile ntsha la gagwe rre pheto re gantsi batho ba ikgatholosa mowa wa boipelego ba lebala fa mokoduwe go tsoswa itekang rre pheto le ene kgothaditse batho ba motse oo go supa mowa wa tshwaragano re fa ba sa dire jalo seo se ka kgoba batho marapo boletse fa baithaopi bao ba setse ba agile dikago tsa mofuta oo tse di nang le maranyane segompieno kwa motseng wa mmankgodi borukuthi mo motsaneng wa kopong banni ba motse wa kopong ba boletse fa ba tshwenngwa ke manweenwee ba tsietsang ba tseela dikoko ba boletse jalo kwa phuthegong ya kgotla neng biditswe ke mopalamente wa kgaolo ya kweneng botlhaba major general moeng pheto ka laboraro rile fa ba tlhalosetsa mopalamente ba bolela fa go na le batho bangwe ba ba tsamayang mo kgaolong ba ikaya le ba twantsho matlhoko leruo mme ba bolela fa go na le bolwetse bongwe jwa dikoko jo bo tlhagogileng banni ba boletse fa dirukutlhi tse di ba bolelela gore di laetswe go tla go bolaya dikoko tsotlhe mo motseng ba bo ba di tshuba ba ne ba tshwaela ba bolela gore dilalome tse di leka go timetsa motlhala ka go ba bolelela gore madi phimolo dikeledi ke dipula tse tlhano mo kokong nngwe le nngwe mongwe wa mme diile motlanyana ne tlhalosa fa utlwaletse ka maepantlo ka podi ya tsela mme batla ganyaola dikoko tsa gagwe ntle le molato re ne nna sebete se molangwana ka ne se kile utlwa ope wa bagolwane ba motse ba umaka kgang epe ka go tlhagoga ga bolwetse jwa dikoko re se se ne sa dira gore bitse bana ba gagwe go tswa gaborone ba tlhagisa ka kgang mme le bone ba ne ba gakgametse fela thata rile tswa la gagwe kgosi michael molefe bolela fa mafoko ao le maa mo ditsebeng tsa gagwe ne tlhagisa banni ba motse gore borukutlhi bo tla ka methale farologaneng mme go botlhokwa gore sethaba se itlhokomele tsweletse ka go tlhalosa gore phetogo nngwe le nngwe tlang mo motseng itsisiwe bagolwane ba motse gore ba fitisetse kwa morafeng re batho bao ba dira borukutlhi ka jalo ba tshwanelwa ke go tseelwa dikgato tse di maleba dipadi tse dingwe"

"morwa ke motse mo kgaolong ya kgatleng mo botswana dikhilomethara tse di lesome le botlhano mo borwa bophirima jwa motse wa mochudi gape palo ya batho ne le makgokgolo mabedi makgolo marataro masome borobabongwe le borataro mo palo bathong ya ngwaga wa morwa lefelo morwa ke motsana mo botswana dikhilomethara tse di masome mararo mo bokoni jwa toropokgolo gaborone motsana golagangwa le toropokgolo ke tsela bo golagangwa ke motlakase abelwang lefatshe lotlhe noka ya metsimotlhabe elelang ka dipaka elelelela mo borwa jwa motsana noka elelela kwa letlamong la bokaa le le nelang banni ba bokaa morwa le toropo ya gaborone metsi pele ga ditlhabololo batho ba ne ba nosiwa metsi go tsweng mo didibend gape pele ga se le mo dinokeng le mo megobeng ditso kgosi ya motsi ke rre eric masisi ntshole yo tsereng mo go rragwe ebong rre mogotsi ntshole rre mogotsi ntshole tsere mo go rragwe ebong rre ramogotsi ntshole bontsi jwa banni ba morwa ke ba letso la bakgatla gape di kgaogantswe ka dikgotlana ebong mokone matetswane manakedi le tse dingwe ditlhabololo ditsela tse ditona di nale sekontere gape go nale dikolo di le bone ebong ramogotsi se se potana our lady of carmel borwa se se golwane gape le se eseng sa puso sa kholetshe motsana nale dipone tse di tshubang bogolo jang mo mebileng ya ditsela tse ditona itlosobodutu morwa nale ditlhopa tsa kgwele ya dinao di le tharo ebong morwa dynamos morwa rising stars gape le lelotong young stars ka malatsi botsala jwa morena gape le meletlo mengwe faphegileng batho gantsi ba itumedisiwa ke ditlhopa tsa meopelo ya setswana gape le maboko motsana berekelang kwa gaborone banni ba motse wa morwa ba ba berekelang kwa gaborone le tlokweng ba boletse mo phuthegong ya kgotla fa ba ka nna ba senyegelwa ke ditiro nako nngwe le nngwe ka ntlha ya letlhoko la dipalamo tse di ikanyegang ba re dipalamo tse di tswang mochudi le rasesa di ba tsenya kwa ditirong banni ba re dibese tseo ga di ba thuse ka sepe ka di tla di tletse mme ba tlhoke se ba se palamang gore ba goroge kwa ditirong ka nako ba buile seo mo phuthegong ya kgotla biditswe ke mopalamente wa kgatleng botlhaba isaac mabiletsa le ba lephata la diteseletso le taolo ya mesepele ya dikoloi tsa setshaba le beng ba dipalamo tseo ba re tharabololo ya leruri mo mathateng bone ke fa go ka nna le bese ya morwa gaborone mathata mangwe babereki ba neng ba bua ka one ke gore le fa ba sa kgona go palama dibese jalo ga ba letlelelwe go ka ikopela mosepele mo dikoloing tsa batho ba ba berekelang kwa gaborone ba re fa mongwe wa bone ka bonwa palama koloi seng ya setshaba beng ba dibese tsone tse ba lelang ka tsone bitsa mapodise le ba taolo mesepele ya dikoloi mme motho wa go nna jalo emisiwe mo tseleng mme ba folosiwe mo sekgweng babereki ba re dikgang tseo di ba tshwenya fela tsa bapagami ka tsoo pedi bile ba tlaa dira tsotlhe tse ba ka di kgonang go ba kgotsofatsa moemedi wa dibese tsa ramotswetla express ene kopile batsena phuthego gore ka moso nne basupi ba se ba se buang re ka ba re ba batla bese ya morwa gaborone re fa ka nna teng ba bo ba ikemiseditse go palama ka ene re lemogile fa bontsi jwa bone ba rata dilefiti go na le dibese tsa setshaba kgosana ya motse wa morwa eric ntshole kopile boradikgwebo ba dipalamo tsa setshaba gore ba nne ba buisa diphuthego tsa kgotla gore ba utlwe matshwenyego setshaba go tila dikgotlhang tse di sa tlhokafaleng moemedi wa lephata la tsa mesepele le diteseletso tsa dipagamo tsa setshaba meshack moshabi re le ene lemogile fa go le botlhokwa gore banni ba morwa le bone ba nne le bese yang gaborone kopile beng ba dibese gore ba kgalemele babereki ba bone mme ba ba rute go tlotla bapagami ka gore babereki ba go nna jalo ba ka tsenya dikgwebo tsa bone mo mathateng re go botlhokwa gore gangwe le gape go nne le bokopano mopalamenteng wa bone mabiletsa ka seemo se se sa ba jeseng monate sa dipalamo mabiletsa re ne ikopanya le ofisi ya tsa dipalamo mme ba bontsha botlhokwa jwa go nna le phuthego ya mofuta oo mme ba dumalana le one maphatla kopantswe go tlokafatsa ditlhabololo go kopanngwa ga maphata puso go diretswe go tokafatsa ditlamelo le go fokotsa ya maphata farologanyeng mme dira tiro le nngwe mafoko ya water utilities wuc kgopho ya metsi leswe le nowang ya go nna boikarabelo jwa lephata leo la wuc ba gakuto ba wela mo metseng le lekgolo le bone ya lekgamu la boraro go sielwa metsi ke wuc tona ne west district dipadi tse dingwe"
"zutswa ke motsana yo mo kgaolong ya kgalagadi mo botswana kwa bonwa kwa sekakeng sa kalahari gape nale sekolo se se botana mo palo bathong ya ngwaga wa dikete tse pedi le bongwe dipalo di ne dile makgolo mane masome marataro le borobabongwe banna ba zutswa ba gakolotswe go nna le seabe mo kgodisong ya bana banna ba lefatshe la botswana ba kgothaditswe go nna le seabe mo kgodisong le tlhokomelo ya bana ba bone kgakololo ntshitswe ke mooki wa kokelo ya zutswa mme cecilia boitshwarelo mo thutopuisanong neng tshwaretswe kwa nata boeng mme boitshwarelo gakolotse borre gore tlhokomelo ya ngwana simologa fela fa mme sa ntse itsholofetse mme gakolola ba leng borabana go nne ba tsamaya le bomme ba bone kwa tshidilong le kwa sekaleng go tsaya botsipa mabapi le tlhokomelo ya ngwana re go itshupile gore seabe sa borre mo tlhokomelong ya ngwana fa ise belegwe le fa sa ntse le monnye thata se le kwa tlase mme boitshwarelo boletse gape gore go botlhokwa gore borre ba itse seemo sa ngwana fa ise belegwe gore ba tle ba tlhaloganye seemo sa ga mme botoka thutopuisano eo ne rulagantswe ke komiti ya botsogo ya kokelo ya zutswa mme ne itebagantse le go rotloetsa borre go nna le seabe mo go tsa botsogo le pelegi banni ba kgotlhadiwa go dirisa mananeo puso mopalamente wa kgaolo ya kgalagadi mo botlhaba mme botlogile tshireletso kgothaditse batlhophi ba kgaolo ya gagwe go dirisa mananeo puso go tlhabolola matshelo bone le go nyeletsa lehuma le le apesitseng lefatshe leno mme tshireletso yo bileng le mothusa tona mo lephateng la dikgaolo dirile kgothatso mo diphuthegong tsa gagwe kwa metseng ya makwate kudumatse dovedale mmaphashalala mookane le dibete tse mo go tsone neng lekodisa banni ba metse eo ka dikgang tsa palamente fetileng re maikaelelo go simolola mananeo ipelegeng ispaad le la limid ne le maiteko mmuso go lwantsha lehuma letlhoko la ditiro le go tsosolosa mohama wa temo thuo ka le tsone tse di ka tswakanyang itsholelo le go nyeletsa lehuma mopalamente boleletse banni ba metse eo gore lenaneo la limid le ka ba thusa go apola batho lehuma ka go ruwa dikgomo dihutshane le dikoko tsa setswana gammogo le go epa didiba tse ba ka di dirisang mo temong ya nosetso mothusa tona re fa batswana ba ka ikemisetsa go dirisa lenaneo la ispaad le la limid ba ka kgona go ntsha dijo tse di lekaneng le go imolola lefatshe leno go ikaega ka dijo tse di rekwang kwa mafatsheng sele mme tshireletso tsweletse ka go lekodisa batlhophi ba kgaolo ya gagwe ka maikaelelo puso go dira molao tlaa laolang dinako tsa thekiso ya majalwa mangwe setswana le molao wa go simolola go kgwathisa basadi mo dikgotleng tsa ditsheko re puso ikaelela go dira molao tlaa nyeletsaang thekiso ya majalwa maitirelo jaaka mokoko ntshebile laela mmago motse teng godimo le sethulaphoko ka jaana go lemogilwe fa le one tsenyang botsogo jwa batho mo diphatseng bile rotloetsa boganana jwa banana dintwa go thubega ga malwapa le dipolaano mo diphuthegong tseo batho ba ne ba itumelela ditlhabololo tse di dirilweng mo metseng ya bone jaaka tsela ya mahalapye kudumatse phatlalatso ya motlakase ditlhaeletsano le ditiro tse di dirilweng ka lenaneo la ipelegeng jaaka go aga diterata tse di kgaoganyang masimo le mahudiso diofisi tsa makgotla setswana kagelelo ya mabitla le go baakanya ditsela le go phepafatsa tikologo ya metse ya bone le fa banni ba makwate kudumatse bolwetse jwa tlhako molomo montsi tlatsa ka gore bolwetse joo bo anama ka bofefo tona tlhalositse gore fa dikgomo tseo di sa bolawe bolwetse bo tlaa anamela kwa dikgaolong tse dingwe tona ne re lebiwa gore tsiang ke ya mofuta ofe le seemo se eleng mo go yone tona de graaf ne kgothatsa barui ba ba amegang go dirisana le badiri ba puso go lwantsha bolwetse jo re maikaelelo bone ke go bolaya le go hupelela dikgomo tseo ka bonako gore bolwetse bo felele gone foo tona ne kgothatsa banni go tswelela ba kenta dikgomo go fitlhelela ka kgwedi ya seetebosigo tlhola lesome le botlhano go netefatsa gore bolwetse joo ga bo anamele kwa dikgaolong tse dingwe mopalamenete wa tati east rre guma moyo ne ntsha mogopolo wa gore go sekasekwe madi phimolo dikeledi rile fa ba akgela banni ba ne ba ntsha mogopolo wa gore puso ya lefatshe leno rotloetse puso ya lefatshe la zimbabwe go kenta dikgomo tsa bone tsotlhe go emisa go anamela ga mogare wa bolwetse joo mo botswana ba ne ba kopa puso le go tsenya terata ya motlakase go laola motsamao wa batho ba lefatshe la zimbabwe le ba botswana ba ba tlolang ba se na dipasa ba ne ba ntsha le mogopolo wa gore bakenti ba tshwanetse go tlhoma kampa ya sennelaruri gaufi le molelwane mo nokeng ba tlhalosa gore barui bangwe ba kgaola terata ka dinako tsa fa dipula di na dikgoge tsa kwa ntle mefuta ya dikgomo dipadi tse dingwe"

ke diphetogo dife tse di tsamaisiwang ka go ikemela ga okanaiseišene kgotswa dielemente tsa yone le melao ya yone ya go tiragatso fa lekanngwa le ditiragalo tsa ka kwa ntle ke eng seo se dirang gore okanaiseišene dira jaaka modiri kgoboka by coordinated and planned cooperation of the elements the organization is able to solve tasks that lie beyond the abilities of the single elements the price paid by the elements is the limitation of the degrees of freedom of the elements advantages of organizations are enhancement more of the same addition combination of different features and extension disadvantages can be inertness through co ordination and loss of interaction"

"Bontsi jwa batho ba ba buang Setswana ba fitlhelwa kwa lefatsheng la Aforika Borwa segolo bogolo mo diporofenseng tsa Bokone Bophirima (North West) le Kapa Bokone. Batswana ba Aforika Borwa ba ka nna didikadike di le 3.4 fa Batswana ba Botswana ba ka nna sedikadike le go feta (gongwe 1.3). Batswana ba Namibia le ba Zimbabwe ba palo potlana. Legale ditirelo tsa kgaso tsa Namibia di gasa gape ka Setswana."
"Setswana ke puo e e monatenate, e e nonneng ka e bile e buiwa mo mafatsheng a mane a a mo borwa jwa Aforika. Baithuti bangwe ba dipuo bare Setswana ke nngwe ya dipuo tse di matswakabele thata go gaisa tse dingwe tsa borwa jwa Aforika. "
"Go tswa ka kgwedi ya Motshegano a le thataro, 2009, Paul Mashatile, tona ya pele ya tsa madi yo eleng modulasetilo wa ANC mo porofenseng ya Gauteng, e ne e le moemedi wa ANC mo Gauteng go tloga ka Lwetse a le supa, 2008, go fitlhelela ditlhopho tsa Nomvula Mokonyane yo neng a emelwa ke Mbhazima Shilowa go tswa ka 1999 e be a tlogela ka mathata a neng a tsogile mo ANC a dirileng gore tautona Thabo Mbeki a tlogele setilo"
"Lefatshe ja Botswana le kwa borwa jwa Aforika, ke lefatshe lê lê dikaganyêditswêng ke a mangwê, ka jalo ga le a bapa le lewatle. Pele ga le tsaya boipusô ka kgwedi ya Phalane e tlhôla masomemararo ka ngwaga wa sekete, makgolo maheramongwe, masomemarataro le metsomerataro (1966) mo go Enyelane le ne le bidiwa Bechuanaland. Lefatshe ja Botswana le dikaganyêditswê ke la Aforika Borwa kwa borwa-botlhaba go fitlha kwa borwa-bophirima, Namibia kwa bophirima, Zambia kwa bokône le Zimbabwe kwa bokône-botlhaba. Lefatshe lê lê bidiwa Botswana, le rêêlelwa ka bannibantsi ba lône eleng Batswana ka lotsô."
"Bontsi jwa bontlha bongwe jwa toropo bo agilwe mo dingwageng tse tharo. Dikago tsa ntlha mo Gaborone di akaretsa palamente, diofisi tsa goromente, madirelo a leokwane, sepatela, dikolo, madirelo a seromamoa, megala ya thaeletsanyo, madirelo a sepodise, poso le a mangwe a fetang dikgolo.. Ka gonne toropo e ne e agiwa ka ka bo nako, go ne go na le baagi ba bantsi ba agile madulo e se ka fa molaong, mo toropong e ntsha ka fa madirelong a ko bothaba. Mafelo a a ne a bitswa Naledi. Naledi  ka thaloso o rayaNaledi , mme gape leka raya ko tlase ga lewapi le le bolegileng  kana motse o kgethegileng mo metseng e mengwe . Ka ngwaga wa 1971, ka ntateng ya go oketsega ga madulo e se ka fa molaong, khansele ya toropo ya Gaborone le bodiredi jwa goromente le mantlo ba ne ba sekaseka lefelo la Bontleng, le le neng la nna le mantlo a thwathwa e e ko tlase. Mme fela, Naledi a tswelela ka go gola, le lethoko la mantlo la oketsega go feta. Ka ngwaga wa 1973, koporase ya mntlo ya Botswana (BHC) ya aga Naledi yo mosha, ka kwa ga tsela go tswa mo Naledi wa bogologolo. Banni ba Naledi o mogologolo ba fudugela ko Naledi yo mosha. Mme fela, lethoko la mantlo la gola gape; go feta mo banni ba ba fudugetseng ko Naledi yo mosha ba ne ba seka ba rata mantlo a teng. Mathata a a rarabololwa ka ngwaga wa 1975 fa Sir Seretse Khama, tautona ya Botswana, fetola Naledi g tswa mo mafelo a dikomponi go ya ko lefelo la matlo a thwathwa e eko tlase."
"Ka kgwedi ya lwetsi e le masome mararo ka ngwaga wa 1966, Bechuanaland e ene ya nna lefatshe la bo lesome le motso go ipusa go tswa mo pusong ya mmamosadinyana mo Aforika. Rra toropo wa ntlha wa Gaborone e ne ele moruti Derek Jones.  Gaberones wa bogologolo o ne wa nna toropo ya   Gaborone o mosha, jaanong o itsege jaaka Village."
"Selekanyo sa bong sa Gaborone ke 97.6, se se raya gore go na le borre ba le 976 fa go tshwantshangwa le bomme ba le  1,000 . Manyalo a le mantsi mo Botswana a kwadisiwa mo Gaborone, mo manyalong otlhe a Botswana a le selekanyo se se lesome le bothano a kwadisitse mo Gaborone ka 2007. Ka dipalo go na le batho ba le bararo mo lwapwng lengwe le lengwe mo Gaborone. Se ke palo e nnye fa go tshwantsha ngwa le tse dingwe mo Botswana."
